dao.name: QRY_BAC_GET_USER_BY_ONE
dao.statement: SELECT u.CMP_ID, u.GRP_ID, u.USR_ID, u.USR_CNAME,u.ACCOUNT_STA,u.USER_ATHENA_ID FROM s99_user u WHERE trim(u.usr_id) = :user_id and u.usr_pwd = :usr_pwd and trim(u.cmp_id) = :cmp_id

dao.name: QRY_CASHIER_RF_CASHIER_COD
dao.statement: select usr_id value, usr_cname display from s99_user where user_athena_id = :athena_id and trim(cmp_id) = trim(:cmp_id)

dao.name: QRY_ALL_USER_WITH_COMP
dao.statement: SELECT USR_ID,USR_CNAME FROM S99_USER where user_athena_id = :athena_id and trim(cmp_id) = trim(:cmp_id)

dao.name: QRY_USR_ID_BY_USR_CNAME
dao.statement: SELECT USR_ID FROM S99_USER where user_athena_id = :athena_id and trim(cmp_id) = trim(:cmp_id)

dao.name: QRY_USER_NOS
dao.statement: select distinct usr_id value, usr_cname as display from s99_user where user_athena_id = :athena_id order by usr_id

dao.name: QRY_S99_GROUP_BY_CMP_ID
dao.statement: select b.cmp_id,a.cmp_name,b.grp_id,t.grp_name,b.usr_id,b.usr_cname from S99_GROUP t,s99_user b,s99_company a where t.cmp_id = b.cmp_id and t.grp_id = b.grp_id and t.cmp_id = a.cmp_id and a.cmp_id = ? order by b.usr_id

dao.name: QRY_ROLE_OF_ACCOUNTS
dao.statement: select bru.role_id,bru.role_comp_cod,bru.user_id from bac_role_user bru where bru.USER_ATHENA_ID = ?
